The limited permissions granted above are perpetual and will not be revoked by UN/CEFACT or its successors or assigns.

exchangedDocument.title: BSP Master. Exchanged_ Document
exchangedDocument.description: The header document information for a use of this master message assembly.

specifiedConsignment.title: BSP Master. Specified. Supply Chain_ Consignment
specifiedConsignment.description: A supply chain consignment specified for a use of this master message assembly.

codeType.title: Code. Type
codeType.description: A character string (letters, figures or symbols) that for brevity and/or language independence may be used to represent or replace a definitive value or text of an Attribute together with relevant supplementary information.

dateTimeType.title: Date Time. Type
dateTimeType.description: A particular point in the progression of time together with the relevant supplementary information.

idType.title: Identifier. Type
idType.description: A character string to identify and distinguish uniquely, one instance of an object in an identification scheme from all other objects in the same scheme together with relevant supplementary information.

UNTDID1001Type.title: Document name code
UNTDID1001Type.description:
Code specifying the document name.

Applicable codes:
* '700' - Waybill
* '703' - House waybill
* '704' - Master bill of lading
* '706' - Bill of lading original
* '710' - Sea waybill
* '711' - Inland waterway bill of lading
* '712' - Non-negotiable maritime transport document (generic)
* '714' - House bill of lading
* '720' - Rail consignment note (generic term)
* '730' - Road consignment note
* '740' - Air waybill
* '741' - Master air waybill
* '890' - Dangerous goods declaration

UNTDID1225Type.title: Message function code
UNTDID1225Type.description:
Code indicating the function of the message.

Applicable codes:
* '1' - Cancellation
* '5' - Replace
* '9' - Original

UNTDID3035Type.title: Party function code qualifier
UNTDID3035Type.description:
Code giving specific meaning to a party.

Applicable codes:
* 'AQ' - Approved consignor

UNTDID8067Type.title: Transport mode name code
UNTDID8067Type.description:
Code specifying the name of a mode of transport.

Code list responsible agency:
UNECE

Code list responsible agency name:
United Nations Economic Commission for Europe

Code list responsible agency code:
6

Code list:
Rec 19

Code list name:
Code for Modes of Transport

Code list version:
2001

Code list issue date:
CL 2001-01

Applicable codes:
* '3' - Road transport
* '4' - Air transport

untdid2379JsonType.title: Date and Time format codes for JSON representation.
untdid2379JsonType.description:
This code list is based on UNTDID 2379. It is adjusted to take JSON date and time representation into account.
# The following abbreviations are used
* 'C' – Century
 * 'Y' – Year
 * 'M' – Month
 * 'D' – Day
 * 'h' – Hour
 * 'm' – Minute
 * 's' – Second
 * 'w' – Week
 * 'T' – Time zone offset separator (+/-/Z) 
 
 * 'A' – 10 day period within a month of a year
 * 'B' – 1: First half month; 2: second half month
 * 'E' – Week of a month
 * 'G' – Working days
 * 'H' – Half month
 * 'I' – 1-9: Shift in a day
 * 'K' – 1-5: First to fifth week in a month
 * 'M' – Trimester: A period of three months
 * 'N' – 1-7: Numeric representation of the day (Monday = 1, Sunday = 7)
 * 'P' – A period of 4 months
 * 'Q' – Quarter
 * 'RR' – 00-99: Time period
 * 'S' – Semester
 *
  * Hyphens and additional character in a format string are kept. According to ISO 8601 a slash is used to separate time spans.
 # Codes from UNTDID 2379 and their representation in JSON
 * '2' – is represented as 'date' format
 * '3' – is represented as 'date' format
 * '4' – is represented as 'date' format
 * '5' – is represented as 'date-time' format
 * '6' – is represented as 'CCYY-MM-B'
 * '7' – is represented as 'CCYY-MM-K'
 * '8' – is represented as 'CCYY-MM-DD-I'
 * '9' – is represented as 'CCYY-MM-DD-RR'
 * '10' – is represented as 'date-time' format
 * '101' – is represented as 'date' format
 * '102' – is represented as 'date' format
 * '103' – is represented as 'YY-Www-N'; 01 is first week of January; 1 is always Monday
 * '104' – is represented as 'MM-WEE/MM-WEE'
 * '105' – is represented as 'YY-DDD'; January the first = Day 001; Always start numbering the days of the year from January 1st through December 31st 
 * '106' – is represented as '-MM-DD'
 * '107' – is represented as 'DDD'
  * '108' – is represented as 'WW'
 * '109' – is represented as '-MM-'
 * '110' – is represented as '--DD'
 * '201' – is represented as 'date-time' format
 * '202' – is represented as 'date-time' format
 * '203' – is represented as 'date-time' format
 * '204' – is represented as 'date-time' format
 * '205' – is represented as 'date-time' format
 * '206' – is represented as 'date-time' format
 * '207' – is represented as 'date-time' format
 * '208' – is represented as 'date-time' format
 * '209' – is represented as 'date-time' format
 * '210' – is represented as 'hh:mm:ssZhh:mm/hh:mm:ssZhh:mm'
 * '301' – is represented as 'date-time' format
 * '302' – is represented as 'date-time' format
 * '303' – is represented as 'date-time' format
 * '304' – is represented as 'date-time' format
 * '305' – is represented as '-MM-DDThh:mm' format
 * '306' – is represented as '--DDThh:mm' format
 * '307' – is represented as 'date-time' format
 * '308' – is represented as 'CCYY-MM-DDThh:mmZhh:mm/CCYY-MM-DDThh:mmZhh:mm' 
 * '401' – is represented as 'time' format
 * '402' – is represented as 'time' format
 * '404' – is represented as 'time' format
 * '405' – is represented as 'duration' format
 * '406' – is represented as 'Zhh:mm'
 * '501' – is represented as 'hh:mm/hh:mm' 
  * '502' – is represented as 'hh:mm:ss/hh:mm:ss' 
  * '503' – is represented as 'hh:mm:ssZhh:mm/hh:mm:ssZhh:mm' 
  * '600' – is represented as 'CC'
  * '601' – is represented as 'YY' 
  * '602' – is represented as 'CCYY' 
  * '603' – is represented as 'YY-S' 
  * '604' – is represented as 'CCYY-S' 
  * '608' – is represented as 'CCYY-Q' 
  * '609' – is represented as 'YY-MM' 
  * '610' – is represented as 'CCYY-MM' 
  * '613' – is represented as 'YY-MM-A' 
  * '614' – is represented as 'YY-MM-A' 
  * '615' – is represented as 'YY-Www 
  * '616' – is represented as 'CCYY-Www' 
  * '701' – is represented as 'YY/YY' 
  * '702' – is represented as 'CCYY/CCYY' 
  * '703' – is represented as 'YY-S/YY-S' 
  * '704' – is represented as 'CCYY-S/CCYY-S' 
  * '705' – is represented as 'YY-P/YY-P' 
  * '706' – is represented as 'CCYY-P/CCYY-P' 
  * '707' – is represented as 'YY-Q/YY-Q' 
  * '708' – is represented as 'CCYY-Q/CCYY-Q' 
  * '709' – is represented as 'YY-MM/YY-MM' 
  * '710' – is represented as 'CCYY-MM/CCYY-MM' 
  * '713' – is represented as 'YY-MM-DDThh:mm/YY-MM-DDThh:mm' 
  * '715' – is represented as 'YY-Www/YY-Www' 
  * '716' – is represented as 'CCYY-Www/CCYY-Www' 
  * '717' – is represented as 'YY-MM-DD/YY-MM-DD' 
  * '718' – is represented as 'CCYY-MM-DD/CCYY-MM-DD' 
  * '719' – is represented as 'CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm/CCYY-MM-DDThh:mm' 
  * '720' – is represented as 'NThh:mm/NThh:mm' 
  * '801' – is represented as 'duration' format 
  * '802' – is represented as 'duration' format 
  * '803' – is represented as 'duration' format 
  * '804' – is represented as 'duration' format 
  * '805' – is represented as 'duration' format 
  * '806' – is represented as 'duration' format 
  * '807' – is represented as 'duration' format 
  * '808' – is represented as 'S' 
  * '809' – is represented as 'P' 
  * '810' – is represented as 'M' 
  * '811' – is represented as 'H' 
  * '812' – is represented as 'A' 
  * '813' – is represented as 'N' 
  * '814' – is represented as 'G'

transportModeCodeType.title: Transport Mode_ Code. Type
transportModeCodeType.description: A character string used to represent a transport mode.

documentCodeType.title: Document_ Code. Type
documentCodeType.description: A character string denoting the type of a document. [Reference United Nations Code List (UNCL) 1001]

messageFunctionCodeType.title: Message Function_ Code. Type
messageFunctionCodeType.description: A character string used to represent a message function.

partyRoleCodeType.title: Party Role_ Code. Type
partyRoleCodeType.description: A character string used to replace or represent a role of a party.

documentAuthenticationType.title: Document_ Authentication. Details
documentAuthenticationType.description: A proof that a document is genuine.

actualDateTime.title: Document_ Authentication. Actual. Date Time
actualDateTime.description: The actual date, time, date time, or other date time value of this document authentication.

id.title: Document_ Authentication. Identification. Identifier
id.description: A unique identifier for this document authentication.

provider.title: Document_ Authentication. Provider. Trade_ Party
provider.description: The trade party providing this document authentication.

exchangedDocumentType.title: Exchanged_ Document. Details
exchangedDocumentType.description: A collection of data for a piece of written, printed or electronic matter that is exchanged between two or more parties.

id.title: Exchanged_ Document. Identification. Identifier
id.description: The unique identifier of this exchanged document.

typeCode.title: Exchanged_ Document. Type. Code
typeCode.description: The code specifying the type of exchanged document.

issueDateTime.title: Exchanged_ Document. Issue. Date Time
issueDateTime.description: The date, time, date time or other date time value for the issuance of this exchanged document.

purposeCode.title: Exchanged_ Document. Purpose. Code
purposeCode.description: A code specifying the purpose of this exchanged document, such as request or reminder.

includedNote.title: Exchanged_ Document. Included. Note
includedNote.description: A note included in this exchanged document.

thirdSignatoryDocumentAuthentication.title: Exchanged_ Document. Third_ Signatory. Document_ Authentication
thirdSignatoryDocumentAuthentication.description: The third signature, also known as the second counter signature, that has been authenticated on this exchanged document indicating where appropriate the authentication party.

recipient.title: Exchanged_ Document. Recipient. Trade_ Party
recipient.description: A trade party that receives this exchanged document.

logisticsLocationType.title: Logistics_ Location. Details
logisticsLocationType.description: A logistics related physical location or place.

id.title: Logistics_ Location. Identification. Identifier
id.description: A unique identifier for this logistics related location, such as a United Nations Location Code (UNLOCODE) or GS1 Global Location Number (GLN).

logisticsRiskAnalysisResultType.title: Logistics_ Risk Analysis Result. Details
logisticsRiskAnalysisResultType.description: The result of a logistics risk analysis calculation.

transportMovementRiskRelatedCode.title: Logistics_ Risk Analysis Result. Transport Movement Risk_ Related. Code
transportMovementRiskRelatedCode.description: A code specifying a transport movement related risk for this logistics risk analysis result.

description.title: Logistics_ Risk Analysis Result. Description. Text
description.description: The textual description of this logistics risk analysis result.

levelCode.title: Logistics_ Risk Analysis Result. Level. Code
levelCode.description: The code specifying the level for this logistics risk analysis result.

screeningMethodCode.title: Logistics_ Risk Analysis Result. Screening_ Method. Code
screeningMethodCode.description: A code specifying a method of screening used in this logistics risk analysis result.

securityExemptionCode.title: Logistics_ Risk Analysis Result. Security_ Exemption. Code
securityExemptionCode.description: A code specifying a security exemption for this logistics risk analysis result.

logisticsTransportMovementType.title: Logistics_ Transport Movement. Details
logisticsTransportMovementType.description: The conveyance (physical carriage) of goods or other objects used for logistics transport purposes.

modeCode.title: Logistics_ Transport Movement. Mode. Code
modeCode.description: The code specifying the mode, such as by air, sea, rail, road or inland waterway, for this logistics transport movement.

callEvent.title: Logistics_ Transport Movement. Call. Transport_ Event
callEvent.description: A call event for this logistics transport movement.

noteType.title: Note. Details
noteType.description: A textual or coded description, such as a remark or additional information.

content.title: Note. Content. Text
content.description: A content, expressed as text, of this note.

subjectCode.title: Note. Subject. Code
subjectCode.description: A code specifying the subject of this note.

referencedDocumentType.title: Referenced_ Document. Details
referencedDocumentType.description: Written, printed or electronic matter that is referenced.

typeCode.title: Referenced_ Document. Type. Code
typeCode.description: The code specifying the type of referenced document.

consignmentItemType.title: Supply Chain_ Consignment Item. Details
consignmentItemType.description: An item within a supply chain consignment of goods separately identified for transport and customs purposes.

sequenceNumeric.title: Supply Chain_ Consignment Item. Sequence. Numeric
sequenceNumeric.description: The sequence number for this supply chain consignment item.

natureIdCargo.title: Supply Chain_ Consignment Item. Nature Identification. Transport_ Cargo
natureIdCargo.description: Transport cargo details of this supply chain consignment item sufficient to identify its nature for customs, statistical or transport purposes.

specifiedLogisticsRiskAnalysisResult.title: Supply Chain_ Consignment Item. Specified. Logistics_ Risk Analysis Result
specifiedLogisticsRiskAnalysisResult.description: Results of a logistics risk analysis specified for this supply chain consignment item.

consignmentType.title: Supply Chain_ Consignment. Details
consignmentType.description: A separately identifiable collection of goods items to be transported or available to be transported from one consignor to one consignee in a supply chain via one or more modes of transport where each consignment is the subject of one single transport contract.

carrierAcceptanceLogisticsLocation.title: Supply Chain_ Consignment. Carrier Acceptance. Logistics_ Location
carrierAcceptanceLogisticsLocation.description: The location where this supply chain consignment will be, or has been, accepted by the carrier.

consigneeReceiptLogisticsLocation.title: Supply Chain_ Consignment. Consignee Receipt. Logistics_ Location
consigneeReceiptLogisticsLocation.description: The location at which this supply chain consignment will be or has been received by the consignee.

transportContractReferencedDocument.title: Supply Chain_ Consignment. Transport Contract. Referenced_ Document
transportContractReferencedDocument.description: The referenced transport contract document for this supply chain consignment, such as an airwaybill or a seawaybill.

includedConsignmentItem.title: Supply Chain_ Consignment. Included. Supply Chain_ Consignment Item
includedConsignmentItem.description: A consignment item included in this supply chain consignment.

mainCarriageLogisticsTransportMovement.title: Supply Chain_ Consignment. Main Carriage. Logistics_ Transport Movement
mainCarriageLogisticsTransportMovement.description: A main carriage logistics transport movement for this supply chain consignment.

tradePartyType.title: Trade_ Party. Details
tradePartyType.description: An individual, a group, or a body having a role in a trade business function.

id.title: Trade_ Party. Identification. Identifier
id.description: A unique identifier of this trade party.

roleCode.title: Trade_ Party. Role. Code
roleCode.description: A code specifying the role of this trade party.

cargoType.title: Transport_ Cargo. Details
cargoType.description: Information about goods being transported identifying their nature for customs, statistical or transport purposes.

id.title: Transport_ Cargo. Identification. Text
id.description: Identification, expressed as text, of this transport cargo that is sufficient to identify it for customs, statistical or transport purposes.

eventType.title: Transport_ Event. Details
eventType.description: A significant occurrence or happening during transport.

occurrenceLogisticsLocation.title: Transport_ Event. Occurrence. Logistics_ Location
occurrenceLogisticsLocation.description: The logistics location where this transport event occurs.
